textBeforeTable: Casual Shirts/Tops - Big Sizes General Measurements Measure a garment that fits well and that you already own. For example, you may be intending to purchase a polo shirt from us but are unsure of the actual size of the garment. Lay your existing polo shirt flat, measure across the chest where the sleeves join the body and multiply by two. That will give you the full chest measurement of the garment. Next, turn the polo shirt over and measure the distance between th collar at the centre of the back, and the hem. That will give you the length measurement. Next, contact us with your measurements and details of the polo shirt you are interested in. We will match a size of polo shirt to your measurements to ensure your purchase is a good fit.
